inclusion.criterion: study will be explained and consent signed
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: IT hydromorphone dose determined and made up by statistician physician
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: spinal anesthetic administered in operating room
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: data collected over next 16 hours according to research design
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: standard nursing orders for monitoring respiratory rate and administering naloxone
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: morphine PCA pump provided in PACU
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: potential benefit of pain relief discussed
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: side effect profiles for IT morphine and hydromorphone discussed
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: use of methadone maintenance for previous opioid abuse
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: inability to obtain a spinal anesthetic
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a pregnant woman undergoing C/S. She has no history of recurrent UTI or underlying disease. The urine culture showed Gram-negative rod-shaped bacterial cells, leukocytes, and leukocyte casts.
